long_description: WTB Volt Race saddle offers a narrow, sleek profile that works great on the road as well as fast-paced XC mountain biking. Synthetic material covers the whale-tail shape, which enables rider to shift back and tilt pelvis forward for added leverage and power. Love Channel helps avoid unwanted pressure; central depression offers soft-tissue relief without sacrificing structural integrity. Pressure relief zones in sensitive areas provide long-term comfort so you can stay in the saddle. Chromoly rails supply a sturdy platform for the saddle. Corners and sides on the WTB Volt Race saddle are reinforced to protect from rips and tears.
short_description: WTB Volt Race saddle offers a narrow, sleek profile that works great on the road as well as fast-paced XC mountain biking.
